DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to observe cyclic tensional force on the osteogenic differentiation of human periodontal ligament stem cells.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Cyclic Tensional Force on Osteogenic Differentiation of Human Periodontal Ligament Stem Cells
DOC.detailed_description: This study is to investigate the effect of the cyclic mechanical strain on the osteogenic differentiation of mesenchymal stem cells. Mesenchymal stem cells will be cultured from the periodontal ligament tissue of the premolars extracted due to orthodontic reason.
DOC.criteria: Orthodontic patients who need to have premolars extracted
